title: AGI, ASI, A*I – Do we have all we need to get there?
summary:
Demis: “[to get to AGI] maybe there’s one or two big innovations needed” Sam: “everything based off what we see today is that it will happen.” Ilya: “But is the belief really that if you just 100x the scale, everything would be transformed? I don’t think that’s true.” Dario: “If you just kind of like […]
